verses.verse: And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto thee.

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and <S%H5975>set<s%> me <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> that I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> him that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H4775>rebellious<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against me: <S%H1992>they<s%> and their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me, even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For they are <S%H7186>impudent<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> and <S%H2389>stiffhearted.<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> do <S%H7971>send<s%> thee <S%H413>unto<s%> them; and thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And <S%H1992>they,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H2308>forbear,<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,)<s%> yet shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there hath <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them, <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H4480>words,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H5621>briers<s%> and <S%H5544>thorns<s%> be <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and <S%H859>thou<s%> dost <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> <S%H6137>scorpions:<s%> be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H408><s%> of their <S%H4480>words,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H4480>looks,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H2308>forbear:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are most <S%H4805>rebellious.<s%>

But <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee; <S%H1961>Be<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> like that <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H6475>open<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H413><s%> thee.
And when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> a <S%H4039>roll<s%> of a <S%H5612>book<s%> was therein;

And he <S%H6566>spread<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> me; and <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>within<s%> and <S%H268>without:<s%> and there was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H413>therein<s%> <S%H7015>lamentations,<s%> and <S%H1899>mourning,<s%> and <S%H1958>woe.<s%>
